ThingDef.label: Adamantite Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Adamantite Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from Adamantite ore.

ThingDef.label: Adamantium Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Adamantium Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from Adamantium ore.

ThingDef.label: Buoyant Steel Scraps
ThingDef.description: Scraps fished from the ocean, must be smelted down to create useable ingots.

ThingDef.label: Buoyant Steel Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from buoyant steel scraps.

ThingDef.label: Brass Ingot
ThingDef.description: An alloy made from copper and zinc.

ThingDef.label: Bronze Ingot
ThingDef.description: An alloy made from copper and tin.

ThingDef.label: Coblat Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Cobalt Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from cobalt ore.

ThingDef.label: Copper Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Can be alloyed with either zinc or tin, to produce brass or bronze respectively. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Copper Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from Copper ore.

ThingDef.label: Corundum Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of Corundum.

ThingDef.label: Corundum Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, can be alloyed with iron to make steel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Corundum Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from Corundum ore.

ThingDef.label: Ebony Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of Ebony.

ThingDef.label: Ebony Ore
ThingDef.description: A type of volcanic glass, thought to be the blood of Lorkhan. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Ebony Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from ebony ore.

ThingDef.label: Volcanic Glass Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of volcanic glass.

ThingDef.label: Volcanic Glass
ThingDef.description: A type of volcanic glass, commonly found in volcanically active regions. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Malachite Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from volcanic glass.

ThingDef.label: Gold Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of Gold.

ThingDef.label: Gold Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, mostly used to create jewelery, or as a form of currency. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Gold Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from gold ore.

ThingDef.label: Iron Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of Iron.

ThingDef.label: Iron Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, one of the most widely used metals. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Iron Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from iron ore.

ThingDef.label: heart stone cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of heart stones.

ThingDef.label: heart stone
ThingDef.description: A peculiar stone mined from volcanic debris, believed to have originated from within Red Mountain. It's warm to the touch, and seems to radiate with energy.

ThingDef.label: Meteoric Iron Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of Meteoric Iron.

ThingDef.label: Meteoric Iron Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that comes only from meteors, used by the Akaviri in their smithing styles. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Meteoric Iron Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from meteoric iron, used by the Akaviri in their smithing styles.

ThingDef.label: Mithril Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Mithril Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from mithril ore.

ThingDef.label: Moonstone Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of moonstone.

ThingDef.label: Moonstone Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. While typically used by the Altmer, the Bosmer and Khajiit are also known to make great use of it. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Moonstone Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from moonstone ore.

ThingDef.label: Nickel Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, mainly used by the Imperials. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Nickel Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from nickel ore.

ThingDef.label: Orgnium Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, commonly used by Maormer, and named after King Orgnum. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Orgnium Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from orgnium ore.

ThingDef.label: Orichalcum Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of orichalcum.

ThingDef.label: Orichalcum Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that comes orichalcum common in Tamriel, used by the Orsimer, who are considerd to be amongst the best smiths in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Orichalcum Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from orichalcum ore.

ThingDef.label: Palladium Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, used by ancient Ayleids. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Palladium Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from palladium ore.

ThingDef.label: Quicksilver Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of quicksilver.

ThingDef.label: Quicksilver Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Quicksilver Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from quicksilver ore.

ThingDef.label: Rubedite Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Mostly used to coat armour intended for high ranking officials and soldiers.

ThingDef.label: Silver Cluster
ThingDef.description: Rock containing a cluster of silver.

ThingDef.label: Silver Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that comes silver common in Tamriel, often used to craft jewlry, or as a form of currency. Weapons made of silver are known to be highly effective against certain creatures. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Silver Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from silver ore.

ThingDef.label: Stalhrim Ore
ThingDef.description: Enchanted ice found in ancient Nordic barrows. Most often used to entomb the dead, protecting in death.

ThingDef.label: Starmetal Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel, used by Redguards for crafting. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Tin Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Tin Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from tin ore.

ThingDef.label: Copper Ore
ThingDef.description: An ore that is commonly found in Tamriel. Must be smelted down in order to create useful ingots.

ThingDef.label: Zinc Ingot
ThingDef.description: An Ingot smelted from zinc ore.
